pageContext.quote: You hear about a friend who has cancer, and you think like, “What would I do if I had cancer?” You do have cancer. You’re going to fucking die. You do have cancer. You just don’t — first off, because lot’s of people do have cancer, so there’s a good chance the cells are already in your body. But like, you do have a fatal diagnosis from a doctor. He just can’t tell you if it’s 6 months or 60 years. But you are definitely, 100%, going to die. And it could be tomorrow. So what are you going to do with that information?
